body: Points to the Support folder of the bundle that ran the item                    TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT           = $TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT
The top-level folder in the project drawer                                      TM_PROJECT_DIRECTORY        = $TM_PROJECT_DIRECTORY
The scope that the caret is inside                                              TM_SCOPE                    = $TM_SCOPE
Full path of the first selected file or folder                                  TM_SELECTED_FILE            = $TM_SELECTED_FILE
Space separated list of the files and folders selected in the project drawer    TM_SELECTED_FILES           = $TM_SELECTED_FILES
Will have the value YES if the user has enabled soft tabs, otherwise NO         TM_SOFT_TABS                = $TM_SOFT_TABS
Will have the value YES if the user has enabled soft tabs, otherwise NO         TM_SOFT_TAB                 = $TM_SOFT_TAB
This variable points to that support folder                                     TM_SUPPORT_PATH             = $TM_SUPPORT_PATH
The currently selected text or the empty string                                 TM_SELECTED_TEXT            = $TM_SELECTED_TEXT
The contents of the current line                                                TM_CURRENT_LINE             = $TM_CURRENT_LINE
The contents of the word under cursor or the empty string                       TM_CURRENT_WORD             = $TM_CURRENT_WORD
The zero-index based line number                                                TM_LINE_INDEX               = $TM_LINE_INDEX
The one-index based line number                                                 TM_LINE_NUMBER              = $TM_LINE_NUMBER
The full file path of the current document                                      TM_FILEPATH                 = $TM_FILEPATH
The directory of the current document                                           TM_DIRECTORY                = $TM_DIRECTORY
The filename of the current document without its extensions                     TM_FILENAME_BASE            = $TM_FILENAME_BASE
The filename of the current document                                            TM_FILENAME                 = $TM_FILENAME
The relative (to the opened workspace or folder) path of the current document   RELATIVE_FILEPATH           = $RELATIVE_FILEPATH
The contents of your clipboard                                                  CLIPBOARD                   = $CLIPBOARD
The name of the opened workspace or folder                                      WORKSPACE_NAME              = $WORKSPACE_NAME
The path of the opened workspace or folder                                      WORKSPACE_FOLDER            = $WORKSPACE_FOLDER
The current year's last two digits                                              CURRENT_YEAR_SHORT          = $CURRENT_YEAR_SHORT
The month as two digits (example '02')                                          CURRENT_MONTH               = $CURRENT_MONTH
The full name of the month (example 'July')                                     CURRENT_MONTH_NAME          = $CURRENT_MONTH_NAME
The short name of the month (example 'Jul')                                     CURRENT_MONTH_NAME_SHORT    = $CURRENT_MONTH_NAME_SHORT
The day of the month                                                            CURRENT_DATE                = $CURRENT_DATE
The short name of the day (example 'Mon')                                       CURRENT_DAY_NAME_SHORT      = $CURRENT_DAY_NAME_SHORT
The current hour in 24-hour clock format                                        CURRENT_HOUR                = $CURRENT_HOUR
The number of seconds since the Unix epoch                                      CURRENT_SECONDS_UNIX        = $CURRENT_SECONDS_UNIX
These were introduced because TM_SELECTED_TEXT is designed to be...             SELECT_RAW                  = $SELECT_RAW
Varies according to the detected file type                                      LINE_COMMENT                = $LINE_COMMENT
Varies according to the detected file type                                      BLOCK_COMMENT_START         = $BLOCK_COMMENT_START
Varies according to the detected file type                                      BLOCK_COMMENT_END           = See next line!

Some command accept 1 or 2 more arguments, the first is the project, the second is the branch.
print_error "L'option --\$OPTARG a besoin d'un entier en parametre. \"\$value\" n'est pas un entier."
[[ \$OPTARG == -* ]] && print_error "L'option -\$arg requiert un argument !" && usage && exit 2
[[ \$arg == \? ]] && print_error "L'option -\$OPTARG n'est pas prise en charge !"

for step in track(range(100), description="Writing some long thing Story..."):
